sn48.21:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.21:4.5: As long as I didn’t truly understand these five faculties’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
sn48.21:4.6: But when I did truly understand these five faculties’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I announced my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
sn48.21:4.7: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
sn48.21:4.8: ‘My freedom is unshakeable; this is my final birth; now there are no more future lives.’”
